attributes.action: Stop Gatwick from introducing Drop off Fees
attributes.additional_details: Understandably Gatwick need to recover financially from the covid crises, however we would like to see the government step in and subsidise the airport for financial losses instead of  asking the public and business' alike who use the drop-off point to cough up the money for their loss. Additionally make it a pick up point with social distancing in order to limit foot traffic thus the spread of covid around the airport.
attributes.background: prevent Gatwick Airport from introducing Drop off fees

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be an operational decision for the company who owns and operates the airport, not the UK Government or Parliament.
